purpose: To provide developers with a flexible and efficient framework for building intelligent agents capable of performing a variety of tasks.
principle: Agno emphasizes modularity and performance, allowing developers to easily integrate and customize agent behaviors while maintaining high efficiency.
reusability: Agno promotes code reusability through its modular architecture, enabling developers to share and reuse components across different agent implementations.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, Agno may have incomplete features and potential bugs that could affect stability and performance.
name: agno
description: Agno is a lightweight, high-performance library for building Agents.
